devices.list.new-thing.heading: Register new Things
devices.list.new-thing.note.text:
You can directly register more than one thing by inserting several hardware device IDs comma separated ( , ).
You can add a couple of tags comma separated.
devices.list.new-thing-created.heading: Things registered
devices.list.new-thing-created.successfu: These Things have been registered successfully
devices.list.new-thing-created.failed-li: Registration of the following Things failed
devices.list.delete-thing.heading: Delete Things
devices.list.delete-thing.sub-header: Do you really want to delete the selected thing?
devices.list.delete-thing.note.text: If you delete a thing all stored data of this thing will get lost.
